original_title: Y2K Millennium Meltdown: The Silent Bomb
overview: Shot on video' "how to" guide on surviving the infrastructure meltdown that was speculated would happen on New Year's Eve 1999.  It's paranoia from the late 1990's!  It opens with a new year's eve party, and the ominous words of a partygoer, but then the phone and power cut out(!) and a suntanned rustic gentleman suddenly appears in a cavelike room, seated by an oil lamp, and adorned in brown. The room as well.
title: Y2K Millennium Meltdown: The Silent Bomb
